      • canRetryKeysDownload

        private boolean canRetryKeysDownload(String userId)
        Tells if the key downloads should be tried
        Parameters:
        userId - the userId
        Returns:
        true if the keys download can be retrieved

      • addDownloadKeysPromise

        private List<String> addDownloadKeysPromise(List<String> userIds,
                                            ApiCallback<MXUsersDevicesMap<MXDeviceInfo>> callback)
        Add a download keys promise
        Parameters:
        userIds - the user ids list
        callback - the asynchronous callback
        Returns:
        the filtered user ids list i.e the one which require a remote request

        private void clearUnavailableServersList()
        Clear the unavailable server lists

      • startTrackingDeviceList

        public void startTrackingDeviceList(List<String> userIds)
        Mark the cached device list for the given user outdated flag the given user for device-list tracking, if they are not already.
        Parameters:
        userIds - the user ids list

      • handleDeviceListsChanges

        public void handleDeviceListsChanges(List<String> changed,
                                     List<String> left)
        Update the devices list statuses
        Parameters:
        changed - the user ids list which have new devices
        left - the user ids list which left a room

      • invalidateAllDeviceLists

        public void invalidateAllDeviceLists()
        This will flag each user whose devices we are tracking as in need of an + update

        The keys download failed
        Parameters:

      • onKeysDownloadSucceed

        private void onKeysDownloadSucceed(List<String> userIds,
                                   Map<String,Map<String,Object>> failures)
        The keys download succeeded.
        Parameters:
        userIds - the userIds list
        failures - the failure map.

      • downloadKeys

        public void downloadKeys(List<String> userIds,
                         boolean forceDownload,
                         ApiCallback<MXUsersDevicesMap<MXDeviceInfo>> callback)
        Download the device keys for a list of users and stores the keys in the MXStore. It must be called in getEncryptingThreadHandler() thread. The callback is called in the UI thread.
        Parameters:
        userIds - The users to fetch.
        forceDownload - Always download the keys even if cached.
        callback - the asynchronous callback

      • doKeyDownloadForUsers

        private void doKeyDownloadForUsers(List<String> downloadUsers,
                                   ApiCallback<MXUsersDevicesMap<MXDeviceInfo>> callback)
        Download the devices keys for a set of users. It must be called in getEncryptingThreadHandler() thread. The callback is called in the UI thread.
        Parameters:
        downloadUsers - the user ids list
        callback - the asynchronous callback

      • validateDeviceKeys

        private boolean validateDeviceKeys(MXDeviceInfo deviceKeys,
                                   String userId,
                                   String deviceId,
                                   MXDeviceInfo previouslyStoredDeviceKeys)
        Validate device keys. This method must called on getEncryptingThreadHandler() thread.
        Parameters:
        deviceKeys - the device keys to validate.
        userId - the id of the user of the device.
        deviceId - the id of the device.
        previouslyStoredDeviceKeys - the device keys we received before for this device
        Returns:
        true if succeeds

      • refreshOutdatedDeviceLists

        public void refreshOutdatedDeviceLists()
        Start device queries for any users who sent us an m.new_device recently This method must be called on getEncryptingThreadHandler() thread.
